verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w obeyeth|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*,

Which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* I brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Obey|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, according to all which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you: so shall ye be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

That I may \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* which I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* I, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, So be \w it|strong="H0543"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft So…: Heb. Amen\f*

Then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

For I \w earnestly|strong="H5749"\w* \w protested|strong="H5749"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* I brought them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add even\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w protesting|strong="H5749"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Obey|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

Yet they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not, nor \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, but \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: therefore I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon them all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add them\add* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; but they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* not.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, A \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* is \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and among the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

They are turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of their \w forefathers|strong="H7223"\w*, which \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; and they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them: the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* have \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which I \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon them, which they shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w escape|strong="H3318"\w*; and though they shall \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto me, I will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft to escape: Heb. to go forth of\f*

Then shall the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* unto whom they offer \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*: but they shall not \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them at \w all|strong="H3467"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft trouble: Heb. evil\f*

For \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* were thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* have ye set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* to \add that\add* shameful \w thing|strong="H1322"\w*, \add even\add* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft shameful…: Heb. shame\f*

Therefore \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* not thou for this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, neither lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* or \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* for them: for I will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that they \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto me for their \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft trouble: Heb. evil\f*

What hath my \w beloved|strong="H3039"\w* to do in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add seeing\add* she hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w lewdness|strong="H4209"\w* with \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* is \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* from thee? when thou doest \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, then thou \w rejoicest|strong="H5937"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft What…: Heb. What is to my beloved in my house\f*\f + \fr 11.15 \ft when…: or, when thy evil is\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, A \w green|strong="H7488"\w* olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, \add and\add* of \w goodly|strong="H8389"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: with the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w tumult|strong="H1999"\w* he hath \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon it, and the \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* of it are \w broken|strong="H7489"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, that \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* thee, hath \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against thee, \w for|strong="H1558"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* against themselves to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* in offering \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath given me \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \add of it\add*, and I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it:\add* then thou \w shewedst|strong="H7200"\w* me their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

But I \add was\add* like a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \add or\add* an \w ox|strong="H0441"\w* \add that\add* is \w brought|strong="H2986"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2873"\w*; and I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that they had \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w devices|strong="H4284"\w* against me, \add saying\add*, Let us \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* with the \w fruit|strong="H3899"\w* thereof, and let us cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, that his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* may be no more \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*.\f + \fr 11.19 \ft the tree…: Heb. the stalk with his bread\f*

But, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, that \w judgest|strong="H8199"\w* \w righteously|strong="H6664"\w*, that \w triest|strong="H0974"\w* the \w reins|strong="H3629"\w* and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, let me \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* on them: for unto thee have I \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* not in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that thou \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not by our \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Behold, I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* them: the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*:\f + \fr 11.22 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

And there shall be no \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of them: for I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \add even\add* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w*.
